document_data.name: Rozzak
document_data.mainbody:
Boss '''Rozzak''' was a lieutenant of [[True Soul]] [[Minthara Baenre]], who served [[the Absolute]] within the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Plenty of lashers, loads of hunters...and a few pariahs to carry the powder kegs.|Rozzak, tallying the cult's forces at the Sanctum.}}
document_data.Possessions: He equipped himself with a [[goblin]]-made warboard and a crude [[scimitar]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Minthara dispatched Rozzak and his scouts to recover a ''[[mysterious artifact]]'', which had fallen from a [[mind flayer]] [[nautiloid]] near the [[River Chionthar]]. After Minthara and her fellow [[True Soul]]s came to believe the artifact was taken to the [[Emerald Grove]], they along with Rozzak began to rally an assault force to take it back from the [[druid]]s and [[tiefling]]s within.
